name: Mentai Uncensored
description: Mentai Uncensored is a relaxing puzzle game in which the goal is to restore the picture to proper orientation by rotating bricks. Occasionally an event will occur mixing your bricks to random rotations, the rate at which this happens can be sped up by selecting a higher difficulty setting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
